db:abstract.db:para: The FolderListModel provides a model of the contents of a file system folder.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: FolderListModel provides access to information about the contents of a folder in the local file system, exposing a list of files to views and other data components.

db:note.db:para: This type is made available by importing the Qt.labs.folderlistmodel module. Elements in the Qt.labs module are not guaranteed to remain compatible in future versions.

db:section.db:para: The folder property specifies the folder to access. Information about the files and directories in the folder is supplied via the model's interface. Components access names and paths via the following roles:
Additionally a file entry can be differentiated from a folder entry via the isFolder() method.

db:section.db:title: Filtering
db:section.db:para: Various properties can be set to filter the number of files and directories exposed by the model.
The nameFilters property can be set to contain a list of wildcard filters that are applied to names of files and directories, causing only those that match the filters to be exposed.

Directories can be included or excluded using the showDirs property, navigation directories can also be excluded by setting the showDotAndDotDot property to false, hidden files can be included or excluded using the showHidden property.
It is sometimes useful to limit the files and directories exposed to those that the user can access. The showOnlyReadable property can be set to enable this feature.

db:section.db:title: Path Separators
db:section.db:para: Qt uses "/" as a universal directory separator in the same way that "/" is used as a path separator in URLs. If you always use "/" as a directory separator, Qt will translate your paths to conform to the underlying operating system.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] count : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of items in the current folder that match the filter criteria.

db:section.db:title: folder : string
db:section.db:para: The folder property holds a URL for the folder that the model is currently providing.
The value must be a file: or qrc: URL, or a relative URL.
By default, the value is an invalid URL.

db:section.db:title: nameFilters : list<string>
db:section.db:para: The nameFilters property contains a list of file name filters. The filters may include the ? and * wildcards.

db:note.db:para: Directories are not excluded by filters.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] parentFolder : url
db:section.db:para: Returns the URL of the parent of the current folder.

db:section.db:title: rootFolder : url
db:section.db:para: When this property is set, the given folder will be treated as the root in the file system, so that you can only traverse subfolders within it.

db:section.db:title: showDirs : bool
db:section.db:para: If true, directories are included in the model; otherwise only files are included.
By default, this property is true.
Note that the nameFilters are not applied to directories.

db:section.db:title: showDirsFirst : bool
db:section.db:para: If true, if directories are included in the model they will always be shown first, then the files.
By default, this property is false.

db:section.db:title: showDotAndDotDot : bool
db:section.db:para: If true, the "." and ".." directories are included in the model; otherwise they are excluded.
By default, this property is false.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.2] showFiles : bool
db:section.db:para: If true, files are included in the model; otherwise only directories are included.
By default, this property is true.
This property was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.2] showHidden : bool
db:section.db:para: If true, hidden files and directories are included in the model; otherwise they are excluded.
By default, this property is false.
This property was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: showOnlyReadable : bool
db:section.db:para: If true, only readable files and directories are shown; otherwise all files and directories are shown.
By default, this property is false.

db:section.db:para: The sortField property contains field to use for sorting. sortField may be one of:

db:section.db:title: sortReversed : bool
db:section.db:para: If set to true, reverses the sort order. The default is false.

db:section.db:title: var get(int index, string property)
db:section.db:para: Get the folder property for the given index. The following properties are available.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.6] int indexOf(url file)
db:section.db:para: Get the index of the given file URL if the model contains it, or -1 if not.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.6.

db:section.db:title: bool isFolder(int index)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the entry index is a folder; otherwise returns false.
